nodes.text: The YV-23 Starforged blaster rifle was a model of blaster rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. It was a similar model to the YV-24 Starforged blaster rifle, and a simpler version of the YV-26 Starforged blaster rifle.
The YV-23 Starforged blaster rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Pilgrim's Shadow Pack.
